FROM gcr.io/oss-fuzz-base/base-builder

# Install basic packages and Bazel dependencies.
RUN apt-get update && apt-get install --no-install-recommends -y software-properties-common python-software-properties && rm -rf /var/lib/apt/lists/*;
RUN add-apt-repository ppa:webupd8team/java
RUN apt-get update && apt-get -y --no-install-recommends install \
  autoconf \
  build-essential \
  curl \
  libtool \
  make \
  openjdk-8-jdk \
  vim && rm -rf /var/lib/apt/lists/*;

#========================
# Bazel installation
RUN echo "deb [arch=amd64] http://storage.googleapis.com/bazel-apt stable jdk1.8" > /etc/apt/sources.list.d/bazel.list
RUN curl -f https://bazel.build/bazel-release.pub.gpg | apt-key add -
RUN apt-get -y update && apt-get -y --no-install-recommends install bazel=0.13.1 && apt-get clean && rm -rf /var/lib/apt/lists/*;


RUN mkdir -p /var/local/jenkins

# Define the default command.
CMD ["bash"]
